message: Hi Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for a limited time. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm confident you'll love.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking of making an offer of $120. I believe it's a fair price considering the product's value.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. I'd like to make a counteroffer of $130. I think that's a fair price considering the product's value.
